0.text: Bug 7785  SaveAs Forgets the file type.

1.text: 1) Open an existing java file 2) Modify it (I moved an existing class) 3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon  A dialog will come up.

2.text: 4) Browse for a valid container location 5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension, which isn't requested.

4.text: Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but  with no file extension shown.

5.text: The icon has also changed from the parent java  file icon to a generic file icon.

6.text: The file is for all intents and purposes now  a generic file, as opening it will prove--the file is opened as text.

7.text: Expected Behaviour:  The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless  explicitly changed.
